title: Mozilla Firefox 121 to Enable Wayland Support by Default on Linux
description:
Firefox 121 open-source web browser is now available for public beta testing with Wayland support enable by default on Linux, as well as other changes.

The post Mozilla Firefox 121 to Enable Wayland Support by Default on Linux appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
